title: 08/20/21 DPS Hour 1 Amy Dash
itunes:title: 08/20/21 DPS Hour 1 Amy Dash
description:
Jason Smith and Rob Parker, in for Dan, react to Thursday night's NFL preseason action and debate who they believe the New England Patriots will start the season with at quarterback. Fox Sports Radio Legal Analyst Amy Dash joins the guys to break down all the info to come from the resolution in Trevor Bauer's restraining order hearings and the latest news on Deshaun Watson. Plus, Antonio Brown gets thrown out of Buccaneers practice!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
